contentrichtext.text: This page was created in 2001 and has been at [[X (band)]] since 2002. A few days ago it was moved to [[X (US band)]] and the 30-odd pages linking to it were changed. It was replaced with a "disambiguation" page which actually ''caused'' ambiguity for any external web pages linking there. A disambiguation page is unnecessary, since people aren't likely to type "X (band)". Realistically, they'll go to [[X]]. I compare this to [[Nirvana (band)]]. Although there're two bands called Nirvana, there's no need to move it to '''Nirvana (US band)'''. <strike>I don't think of X as a US band, just a great band.</strike> Last (and least) this ''X'' is certainly better known than any other X band. For comparison, try a Web search for its singer "Exene Cervenka". [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 08:40, May 7, 2004 (UTC) :Previous debate of this proposal: [[Template:VfD-X band]]. - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 10:37, May 7, 2004 (UTC) * Keep. The current setup is clearer. - [[User:Topbanana|TB]] 08:52, 7 May 2004 (UTC) ** At the top, I state reasons why it's very much less clear. Would you please address them? [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 21:01, May 8, 2004 (UTC) ***I don't see it really takes more justification than that. The current setup looks clearer (c.f. [[Pliny]]) - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 00:35, May 9, 2004 (UTC) * Keep the page.[[User:Grant65|Grant65]][[User talk: Grant65| (Talk)]] 09:57, May 7, 2004 (UTC) * Keep the current setup, it's entirely sensible. - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 10:37, May 7, 2004 (UTC) * <s>Keep it as it is. --[[User:Brockert|Ben Brockert]] 21:41, May 7, 2004 (UTC)</s> **Keep it as it is, so that [[X (US band)]] can't be moved back. Whether one is slightly more popular than the other or not doesn't matter. Items to be disambiguated don't have to have parity in popularity, they just need to be abmiguous, as [[X (band)]] is. Look at [[Pliny]], for example. [[Pliny the Elder]] is much more well known and has a lot more links than [[Pliny the Younger]], but they are disambiguated as equals, as they should be. --[[User:Brockert|Ben Brockert]] 17:30, May 8, 2004 (UTC) ***[[Wikipedia:Disambiguation#Types of disambiguation|Wikipedia policy]] says if one meaning is clearly predominant, it remains at the general title. At the top I tell how you can determine that. ''Pliny the Elder'' and ''Pliny the Younger'' are their commonly-used names already, so there's no need to change either of them. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 00:08, May 10, 2004 (UTC) ****Yeah, but it isn't "clearly predominant". Of course a search on Exene Cervenka will turn up the US X, just as a search on Ian Rilen won't - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 10:56, May 10, 2004 (UTC) *****8,450 vs. 283 Google hits speaks for itself. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 14:17, May 10, 2004 (UTC) ******Yes - it says "more, but hardly so overwhelming as to wipe out the smaller one." - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 14:56, May 10, 2004 (UTC) * Keep it as it is. I agree that nobody is likely to type "X (band)", but you say yourself that external pages might link there - do you want them to get nothing, or to get this disambiguation page?! --[[User:Stormie|Stormie]] 00:37, May 8, 2004 (UTC) ** I want it deleted so that the original page can be moved back where it was. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 00:44, May 8, 2004 (UTC) * Comment- [[Wikipedia:Deletion policy#Commenting on a deletion request|Wikipedia policy]] says voters should include their reasoning with their opinion. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 15:35, May 8, 2004 (UTC) **Is mine better now? --[[User:Brockert|Ben Brockert]] 17:30, May 8, 2004 (UTC) ***It only addresses the stated ''least'' important reason. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 20:49, May 8, 2004 (UTC) ****Your least important reason isn't necessarily '''the''' least important reason. I can now answer your question from the [[MediaWiki:VfD-X_band|last discussion]], ''"How do you prevent people from arguing on the VfD page and just vote?"'' You don't argue with them after they've "just" voted, that's how. --[[User:Brockert|Ben Brockert]] 01:36, May 9, 2004 (UTC) ****Ben, I apologize for sounding argumentative. My intent was to encourage everyone to state his case as completely as possible. Something along the lines of "on this point you're wrong because XXX, and on this point you're right, but it's outweighed because XXX." My hope is that will keep the discussion focused. [[User:Mackerm|Mackerm]] 20:13, May 9, 2004 (UTC) * Maybe more X US Band back and add a link at the top to the Aussie one [[User:Burgundavia|Burgundavia]] 07:19, May 13, 2004 (UTC)
